website_summaries.verdict: Slice through the water with ease with this strong, lightweight paddle.
pros: This 2-piece paddle consists of a lightweight aluminum shaft and a nylon blade for high strength without excessive bulk
The handle is ergonomic to reduce fatigue, and the height is adjustable from 70 to 83 inches
Guaranteed to float when the parts are together
cons: The height adjustment mechanism is not as strong as the other components

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Great customer service and warranty
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used one off of Amazon warehouse, which claimed to be "Like New," but it ended up being defected. Disappointing, BUT I was impressed by their level of customer care when they sent me a brand new paddle replacement. Thanks, yall!
customer_reviews.author: Cougar Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first use.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap design. Don’t bother. The buckle to adjust the height just broke on my first time using it. It also took half the skin off my thumb in the process. This certainly isn’t the cheapest paddle or the most expensive but it’s not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: C.L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Paddle Without The Price Tag
customer_reviews.text: Already spent a pretty penny on my SUP and didn't want to break the bank on a paddle. This is a great paddle, used it for the first time this weekend. Thought I ordered the 3 piece so it would fit in my SUP bag but I guess I ordered the 2 piece. Works great, pretty light weight and easy to adjust the size (I alternate between sitting and standing a lot). If you want it to fit in your SUP bag thought, get the 3 piece. The two piece one is still pretty long. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kaetlynn Daoust

customer_reviews.title: Decent paddle for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this paddle so I wouldn't have to share my nice carbon shaft paddle with the Sea Scouts who occasionally try out my SUP, so I just wanted something cheap and reasonably sturdy. The paddle is definitely both of those, but it's actually a very pleasant paddle to use and works well. I was initially skeptical about the way the adjustment clip works, but it has proved to be simple and reliable, and actually, the bump is in a convenient place to serve as a sort of handle for the lower hand so instead of being in the way it's sort of useful.
customer_reviews.author: T.W. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I rent SUPs (and canoes and kayaks), and am always in the market for inexpensive, but durable, paddles. The BPS paddles fill the bill, and the customer service has been 5-star. Thee problem with rental paddles is that the movable part of the adjustment clip sometimes falls off. When I mentioned this to Blair in an email, he was quick to respond with additional clips. My biggest complaint is the shipping. I order 12 paddles at a time, and each paddle comes with it's own box and wrapping, and was and a pain in the ass with which to deal considering the volume of cardboard. All in all, the paddle should last though normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: you can trust this seller
customer_reviews.text: If you need carbon fiber, be blessed. This paddle floats in two pieces for ever. For the money and the typical use, you won't go wrong. 2.1 lbs. is what it is and feels great. The thing that I didn't count on was the warranty that this company offers in belief of it's products. You can't go wrong. Also, I enjoyed a couple hours of paddling around our lake and the feel of this paddle. R.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: "New" item was deluvered USED
customer_reviews.text: While the product is exactly what I was looking for and ordered, it appears to be used. There are scratch marksand dirt on the paddle. Very disappointed, but need the item for this weekend so I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie M

customer_reviews.title: Just received, based on appearance only.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and have not used it yet. I will update review after using it. This is just by appearances upon opening. It was well packaged, and in perfect condition. Looks very well made and sturdy. The height adjuster looks like it will last and is easy to use. I will see how it does in actual use, but from appearances it should do fine. I will try out in my pool in the next few days
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette M. StoltzTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Surf and snow (the business that shipped the paddle) took extra concern to make sure I received a good product and have a point of contact for questions and concerns. They’ve reached out prior to receiving the paddle and included contact information should I need it. The paddle is as described and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Pabble trully looks good, however has a serious design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I took my new paddle down to my dock to try it out with my surf board and tried to adjust the paddle length. When removing the adjustment clip it sprung out into the lake and was lost in 35 feet of water. I found this to be a design error and not a user error. The company could design the pine adjustment to be apart of the paddle internal mechanism with a push button spring action. This paddle was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott U.

customer_reviews.title: Nice floating paddle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this paddle because it floats and my last one sank to the bottom of the river (don't buy a none floating version...no matter how careful, it will eventually be dropped or slide into the water when you least expect it). Comes with a nice zippered cover. I would have rated 5 stars, but the length adjustment clip is plastic and feels like a weak point in the design. No issues so far, but I am careful not to break it while adjusting the extension.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy paddle, good value
customer_reviews.text: I really like this paddle , I bought it to replace a cheaper paddle that is sometmes included in SUP package deals that broke off in my hand mid stroke. I can paddle quite hard and it fells very sturdy. The holes on the shaft whistle when a breeze kicks up, I might have to put somne tape over them if it continues to bother me.

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive than a WalMart paddle, likely much better
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around and didn't want to spend $90-$100 on a paddle, but probably will next time just for weight savings. This feels heavier than the advertised 2.1 lbs, but maybe that's due to the heavy paddle portion. I'm 6'2" and it feels just right at full length. The adjustment is easy for making the paddle shorter or longer when kneeling. It is getting scratched from the button adjustments but otherwise a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, good weight, great paddle for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this paddle and took it out yesterday. It became the preferred paddle of use in our group. The paddle has solid construction, it's got a good weight, easy to adjust, and it moves through the water very nicely. For the price, it's a great buy! So much so that I maybe replacing some of our other paddles with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Minneapolis Jon

customer_reviews.title: Paddle broke on second day.
customer_reviews.text: Paddle broke on second day surfing in Maui, and because it was purchased just over 30 days ago no refund is permitted by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: TroyMcCas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Paddle
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter calls it “An Epic Paddle”. She is very pleased with it. G-pa went on U-Tube to figure out how to work the extension. We are very pleased with this paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Girl S

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: The paddle was used the day we unpacked it and all weekend long. It worked great and would recommend it to anyone. The only 1-2 star ratings I read before ordering were from people who said the paddle wasn't strong/sturdy enough for heavy waves in the ocean. We are strictly using our board and paddle on a Wisconsin lake and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: mary k miller

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this paddle. It's sturdy but lightweight, paddles very nicely, adjusts easily, and stands up to my using it as a pushpole sometimes. Good item.
customer_reviews.author: John Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I think the company has contacted me three times to make sure I am happy with my purchase. I am. My daughter and I took our paddleboards out yesterday and the paddles performed great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Michener

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last :(
customer_reviews.text: Just got these paddles(we have 2) out for the second season (limited use) and one of the locking mechanisms broke - so no longer useful - ordered them late May 2017, now it’s June 2018....just past the 12 months :(
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good amount of adjustment to length.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy purchase/shipping. Easy to assemble and have a good amount of “adjustment” to length. It does leave your hands a little black for the first few uses. I would recommend wiping it down with rubbing alcohol before use.
customer_reviews.author: Lou D.

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the price, love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I have the graphite paddle by this company. This version is perfect, sturdy, light, easy to adjust, good strength in the paddle. A bargain in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Schiffner

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Received this item quickly and arrived as described. Seems sturdy and well built. I used it for a 2 hour trip and it worked well without any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Falcon 69

customer_reviews.title: Good Paddle
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy paddle that seems designed well to max strokes. Just wished it broke down further.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Paddle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great paddle with good adjustment and quality build. Perfect for the beginner to intermediate stand up paddle boarder.
customer_reviews.author: Jake S

customer_reviews.title: Nice paddle for use at the lake We like the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice paddle for use at the lake We like the adjustable paddle for all of us. We used this paddle for the first time last weekend and would expect this would last a few years like our others.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Dot

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner or extra paddle for friends.  It floats!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an extra paddle for our extra SUP. Something that anybody could use when they visit our camp in Maine. It does the trick and it does float (has Styrofoam inside the shaft). It's heavier than most high end paddles, but I expected that. Easy to adjust the handle height. The packing was intact, when it arrived....which I appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: I. Schroder

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Seems durable after one lake and one river paddling trip. Only reason I give it 4 stars is that it is a little long. In retrospect I think I would have purchased a 3 piece because the 2 piece is a little cumbersome to fit in my car. It will fit, but takes some finagling.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Felix

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works well
customer_reviews.text: As an absolute beginner at paddleboarding, I'm far from a paddle expert -- but this one feels great. I was concerned it might feel thin or cheap. The weight seems just right. Furthermore, I'm impressed with how much the company reaches out after the purchase to make sure you're satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Trush

customer_reviews.title: good stiffness to transfer power
customer_reviews.text: A good overall paddle that has a good shape handle and easy to adjust the length. Nice and stiff to transfer power.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: but I purchased it because of all the positive reviews and the good price point
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually used the paddle yet, but I purchased it because of all the positive reviews and the good price point. We're a first time SUP family so I didn't feel the need to spend extra on a carbon fiber paddle. The paddle looks great, doesn't feel very heavy, and adjusts easily up and down, so I imagine it will work well for our needs. The seller shipped this item immediately and it arrived very quickly. Great transaction overall.
customer_reviews.author: Man in the yellow hat.

customer_reviews.title: the upper shaft is foam filled and the paddle floats nicely.. the handle grip fits the palm
customer_reviews.text: It works very well ,,the blade is bonded to the lower shaft and it's water tight,, the upper shaft is foam filled and the paddle floats nicely..the handle grip fits the palm, however it is unidirectional and the paddle must be rotated when switching hands,,all in all a great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. My husband did some research and found out this paddle has the most rated stars for affordability and quality. . We didn’t have the time to test the paddle out in the water yet. Will do a second review when we test it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana 808

customer_reviews.title: good price for a low end paddle
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these before. good price for a low end paddle. works fine for our purposes (we are weekend paddlers - just for fun not competition)
customer_reviews.author: doran j swan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic adjustable paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic paddle - after much research & reviews I decide on this one. The price was great compared to the marine shop offerings. First use was at the lake for the paddle board. My family loved it perfect for my 6 ft son and 2 small granddaughters. This paddle is adjustable for the whole family that made it a win-win!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle and amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd bought the one where the handle separates halfway, but that's my fault for not looking at the different products closely enough.
customer_reviews.author: NoOne

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy adjusting paddle
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these paddles and have taken them on both ocean and lakes and they have both exceeded my expectations. they are light weight, easy to adjust and comfortable in the palm of my hand to paddle anywhere
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Love the paddle! Great customer service! From the start, you can feel it’s a sturdy, lightweight paddle. Unfortunately after a year, the paddle jammed and we couldn’t extend it. Contacted the seller and they replaced it right away. We love our new paddle and is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Hideo

customer_reviews.title: Delivered broke amd bent.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived bent and broke..The broken off handle was not even in the box....
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Nice Paddle
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to replace paddle that came with our paddleboard and was lost. This paddle works well - we're amateur paddleboarders, so it does the job for us. Like that you can adjust the handle since we're all different heights.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Nice little paddle
customer_reviews.text: Nice little paddle, feels solid which was a worry with the 3-piece versions but this one has been great for maybe the 5 times I've used it so far.
customer_reviews.author: skych

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: Husband was asking for this for a while, so I went ahead and got it. Really nice paddle for the price, and nice that it has a cover so you can keep it nice.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Belskamper

customer_reviews.title: Good paddle
customer_reviews.text: Good paddle. I've used it about 10 times now, its quite sturdy and I like the design that allows it to be adjustable and still maintain its water-tight seal so that it doesn't fill the rod up with water. Only complaint is that there is a little wiggle in the connecting rod and the adjustable shaft, but its not a deal breaker!
customer_reviews.author: DHC2

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price - locking mechanism is solid
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a backup paddle for our sailboat. It will work great.
customer_reviews.author: KC Pup

customer_reviews.title: Yes the paddle floats
customer_reviews.text: The last paddle board paddle we had the kids were messing around with it and somehow they did not get it set right and the bottom blade fell off and sank to the bottom of the lake to never be seen from again. Ordered this one and immediately tried it out to make sure that both section floated and they did. The paddle is made nicer than the original and the case is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This product was just as described. It even came with a cover for the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Angela P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Price. Lightweight and Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't yet used the paddle, I examined it and adjusted the length. I also assessed the weight and grip to determine comfort. It's lightweight and comfortable in my hands. All is good and I'm anxious to try it out on our Northwoods, WI lake soon. The big test though will be the paddle's durability.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Zierk

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my neighbor, I have found this to be a great paddle. Not much to beat it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle for the price! I love the pull out adjustment, instead of those frustrating push pin designs that often are stiff and hard for smaller fingers. It was lightweight and did indeed float, yet seems sturdy. We'll see how it holds up to kid use this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie On Dog Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not practicle
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that because unfortunately it is no easy to divide into 2 pieces. It's not foldable. Looks like I have to go to a specialized store to do the service. Not practice and I'm thinking about delivery it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Lost a paddle and got this for a replacement and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: doitalldad

customer_reviews.title: Not easily portable
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't break down and too long to fit in a normal trunk. Adjustment piece is not easy either. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great value, sturdy paddle
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, affordable SUP paddle. I bought this to use when I don't want to risk banging up my carbon fiber paddles, or for loaning to guests or beginning paddlers. I thought it would feel extremely heavy, but it's actually not bad. Great value for the price, so I am glad I bought two of these.
customer_reviews.author: DOROTHY

customer_reviews.title: This paddle is a good price and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: The paddle arrived promptly and is sturdy. It was a good price and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice paddle and the size is easily adjustable for different users. I am very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really love this paddle
customer_reviews.text: I really love this paddle! It's lightweight and has a great range in height. Good product for the price. It took a little time to figure out how to adjust it because there were no instructions. But I think that must just have been an oversight in packing/shipping. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Patti C.

customer_reviews.title: Buying again
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, our paddle was stolen last time we used it, but we had already discussed buying another! Great paddle for our ISUP.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: this is a beautiful and easy to handle paddle
customer_reviews.text: this is a beautiful and easy to handle paddle. The company is terrific. Sadly, I have to return it because I really need a paddle that breaks down into three pieces for travel. I wish they made one that does that--a terrific company and quality product.
customer_reviews.author: LindaJB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Very well made and easy to use. It floats in water and held up well to hours and hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA BRIGGS

customer_reviews.title: Best Paddle We've Bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband after his old one broke. He was surprised and said that it's the best one he's ever had. He didn't even know that they could be very different or make such a difference. He said he can go faster with less effort and turn a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: High quality paddle that is easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality paddle that is easily adjustable!! Shipped quickly for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Zitzman

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle, and double lock system that keeps it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle, and double lock system that keeps it from rattling, filled with foam so it floats, very happy with it. Had some flashing on the handle that was annoying, but some sandpaper knocked it down smooth in a couple minutes. Great value compared to others I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Newlon

customer_reviews.title: solid paddle. bought as a replacement for one my ...
customer_reviews.text: solid paddle. bought as a replacement for one my kids broke. Been using it for 2 months now. No flaws with it. very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for a sinker
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my original SUP paddle which came apart while in use and sunk to the bottom of a lake. It appears to be just what I needed. Haven't used it yet. Packaged arrived safely in a very long box, which can't be helped. Easily adjustable. Tested to see if it floats and it does. Looking forward to giving it a try soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Bought this one based on the reviews and so far am very happy. Comfortable to use and seems to float
customer_reviews.text: Had to purchase a paddle since my SUP that was supposed to come with a paddle was missing it's paddle... Bought this one based on the reviews and so far am very happy. Comfortable to use and seems to float.
customer_reviews.author: Erin R.

customer_reviews.title: ... my fiberglass three piece did so I am very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to adjust the length is the only complaint thus far but I do not see the blade falling out and sinking as my fiberglass three piece did so I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Walter

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles, awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Best paddles out there for the price! I Had a minor issue and the owner emailed me back faster than I chug a beer, which is lightning fast! I'm super stoked with the product and the company, I will buy another paddle, cuz I drink too much and lose things!
customer_reviews.author: ZacharyB

customer_reviews.title: Works great! It was a little tricky to figure out ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It was a little tricky to figure out how to adjust the paddle -
customer_reviews.author: Joel Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works well
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works well, and it floats! Lightweight and durable, love that I can change the height for multiple users in our family. Mine came with a blade cover which my teens think makes it look cool.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Used product
customer_reviews.text: We received a used product that was repackaged. When we unpacked the paddle, we found it has a lot of scratches and has previously been used.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Chocron

customer_reviews.title: Great SUP paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfortable, great quality. This is my second one. Did a lot of research and ended up choosing this one because of the great reviews, even though the price is a bit outside of my comfort zone. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: A great product at a fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: A great product at a fantastic price! After receiving our first one, we went ahead and ordered two more for our other paddle boards. They also had awesome customer service- they emailed the date we were to receive the paddle making sure we got it and that everything was good. That is so rare these days, and so appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Larsen

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PADDLE
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE - STRONG PADDLE FOR USE WITH MY PADDLEBOARD.
customer_reviews.author: HANDYWOMAN

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I can paddle on my SUP thanks to this. It is easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: theinfamousj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These paddles are great for the whole family! Not too heavy, floats well, and quality is excellent. I bought two a couple of years ago and recently ordered a third for a new board.
customer_reviews.author: Dad2three

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the paddle that came with up SUP. It's super sturdy and I appreciate that it does float.
customer_reviews.author: Lolita Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: We haven't used it yet but the paddle looks fine. It can be adjusted to many settings
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used it yet but the paddle looks fine. It can be adjusted to many settings. It is quite long at the shortest setting (unlike our other paddles) so, this paddle is good for a grown up but not good for a child.
customer_reviews.author: DSam

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great Paddles. Same thing as the local shop sells for $100.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D.

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle, amazing price! Received really fast. Instructions were waiting for me in my email!
customer_reviews.author: VogueFauxReal

customer_reviews.title: Happy paddlers
customer_reviews.text: Great service!! sent the paddles to my wife in Hawaii they were exactly what we wanted and arrived in 2 days. great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Coke

customer_reviews.title: Weak materials
customer_reviews.text: Backup paddle, broke in the beginning of the second session. Can't even get my money back now because it was back up, purchased 3 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Anon HNL

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was given this paddle as a gift with a SUP. I purchased a second one to use with a second SUP. It is very easy to adjust the length so it fits everyone in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Spees

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good paddle
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good paddle, although the adjustability range comparing to the length of the paddle is fairly small. It's barely qualify to be called adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Vrungel

customer_reviews.title: solid paddle
customer_reviews.text: The only issue with this paddle is weight- its heavy. But that's good for a cheap paddle because it's strong. This thing is pretty bomber, nothing not to like for a solid paddle. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Brian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I really like how the adjustment clips into ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I really like how the adjustment clips into the paddle. My old paddle shaped in like a hinge and ended up breaking. This one shape around the paddle and seems much more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Solid product.  Someone must hAve just forgot to include the cover...
customer_reviews.text: Solid paddle i like. I was really looking forward to the paddle cover it states comes with it. Unfortunately mine did not come with one.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Great all around paddle
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle- all around use- we use it to paddle in our lake- it's comfortable to hold and easy to adjust. The cover is a nice addition . Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: nitereader

customer_reviews.title: its a solid product but its a pain in the ...
customer_reviews.text: its a solid product but its a pain in the ass to make smaller. it holds up well in the water but its not very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Hana Moskowitz

customer_reviews.title: Fast ship and as described.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Exactly as described. We haven't used them yet because we are waiting for our boards, but I am sure they will work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Zveare

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Light weight and the palm grip was comfy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Light weight and the palm grip was comfy.. Only had one trip out so I will have a follow up but great paddle. I really like the follow up email with directions. Being new to paddle boarding this was great.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: great paddles at affordable price!  Shipping as promised!
customer_reviews.text: Paddles very good quality, adjustable 2 piece, heavy duty, and a very good value compared to other paddles on the amazon and local shops I investigated. Had 2 day shipping and miraculously arrived in 2 days to Hawaii. This was a totally satisfying purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G Hand

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to adjust and perfect for paddle board! My kids use it all the time! Well made and durable!
customer_reviews.author: P.G.

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: The pin comes out when adjusting the length. I’ve lost it several times in the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I believe this paddle is well made but way too heavy. I have 4 paddleboards with 4 metal paddles and this one is the heaviest, not by a little but alot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: It's better now
customer_reviews.text: It is my second one. Not sure if the blade is actually "bullet proof" but it is a nice paddle for this price. They've changed the adjustment height of the bar to a more traditional (and easier to align) system.
customer_reviews.author: LUIS C SANTINI

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle, Great company!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the SUP paddle we ordered and excited about the other offerings. Will definitely be back to shop for our surf and snowboard needs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described in description, adjustable lightweight paddle (that floats in water). I personally did not find it heavy at all and have no problem using for my SUP. Great paddle for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome paddle!
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is awesome, and I'm not sure why you would want to pay more for a paddle. It's nicely designed, very solid, and it floats. I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Coble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good paddle - and unlike old one that came with SUP, it floats!
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight. Hesitant to adjust on the water since the ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Hesitant to adjust on the water since the adjustment latch could pop off and fall in the water if not careful. I would buy another, when I get another board.
customer_reviews.author: James Sre

product_meta.title: BPS Adjustable 2-Piece Alloy SUP/Stand Up Paddleboard Paddle - Choose Accent Colors
feature_bullets: New LOGO COLORS available! Get the high-performance BPS ALLOY COMPOSITE PADDLE that's sought after by SUP rental companies all over the world for its excellent construction: strong ALUMINUM shaft, NYLON blade, instant and reliable adjustment mechanism, and an ergonomically designed handle -- all at an amazing price! PLUS, a great BLADE COVER ($14.99 value) to protect the blade from scratches and sun damage.

It only takes seconds to set your own length preference and it stays locked in place until you change it. The paddle height adjustment range is 1800 - 2130 mm (70.86 - 83.85 in). It is extremely light at only 2.1 lbs and super user-friendly. It can separated into 2 parts for more convenient storage/transport.

These products are designed & tested by experienced paddlers. BPS paddles are guaranteed to FLOAT when the parts are together. Every buyer will be emailed a photographic e-guide, written by an experienced paddle boarder.

Buy with complete confidence, as all our products are stored and shipped quickly and reliably to you. All BPS products come with a 'next-level guarantee' for 12 months. So if you encounter any quality issues at all, just let us know and it will be replaced or you'll be refunded -- your choice!

Thank you for looking at a product from our store, Surf and Snow Warehouse. We are a small family business that ONLY sells what we know and love -- water sports gear. We know our products, use our products, and stand behind them 100%. We are known for the great product support, advice, and after-sales service we provide. So if you have ANY questions about any of our products, please just ask.
